Boom, Bang, Blast The Joy of Fireworks was an illustrated guide to fireworks and explosive-making penned by Avery Sonshal from Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Avery Sonshals work collected recipes for explosives intended for mass-production.
A copy of Boom, Bang, Blast The Joy of Fireworks could be found displayed in inside Felogyrs Fireworks in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the .
